title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document detailed project requirements including user stories, features, constraints, functional and non-functional requirements. Clearly define the scope and objectives of the platform ensuring clarity for all stakeholders. Consider potential future scalability, integrations with other systems, and platform resilience to handle high traffic. Also, ensure the defined requirements align with the project's vision and overall business goals.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, and database components. Define the technologies and frameworks to be used.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Design and Implement User Authentication
description: Design and implement user authentication and authorization mechanisms, including employee and organization onboarding.

title: Design and Implement Skills Management
description: Design and implement a system for managing employee skills, including skill tagging, proficiency levels, and skill endorsements.

title: Design and Implement Opportunity Management
description: Design and implement a system for managing volunteer opportunities, including opportunity creation, approval, and assignment.

title: Design and Implement Matching Algorithm
description: Design and implement an algorithm to match employee skills with volunteer opportunities based on predefined criteria.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for employees, organizations, and administrators, including dashboards, opportunity browsing, and skill management.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Ensure the platform meets quality standards.

title: Deploy and Monitor Platform
description: Deploy the platform to production environments and implement monitoring and logging systems for performance and issue tracking.

title: Develop User Documentation
description: Create user documentation, including guides, tutorials, and FAQs, to assist employees, organizations, and administrators in using the platform.
